title: Korean Air Fryer Chicken
method: Marinate chicken in gochujang, soy sauce, and sesame oil for 1 hour.
Place in air fryer basket and cook at 180°C for 20–25 minutes, turning once.
Serve hot with steamed rice and kimchi.
swaps: Can substitute gochujang with sriracha for milder flavour
hydrationTip: Pair with a glass of water to balance spice heat.

title: Jewish Brisket
method: Brown brisket in a heavy pan, then transfer to a roasting dish.
Add onions, carrots, and stock, cover tightly with foil.
Slow-cook in oven for 3–4 hours until tender.
Slice and serve with mashed potatoes or kugel.
swaps: Replace beef stock with vegetable stock for lighter flavour
hydrationTip: Serve with a glass of water alongside rich meat dishes.
